sentence.text: Downregulation of osteoblast differentiation, smoothened signaling pathway, negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II and negative regulation of smoothened signaling pathway was demonstrated in clinical samples of choriocarcinoma and hydatidiform moles as well as choriocarcinoma cell lines when compared with normal placentas.

entity.text: negative regulation of smoothened signaling pathway
negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: Ectopic expression of negative regulation of smoothened signaling pathway in two choriocarcinoma cell lines JAR and JEG-3 led to a decrease in cell growth and increase in apoptosis demonstrated by MTT and TUNEL assays, respectively.

entity.text: negative regulation of smoothened signaling pathway
